item.title: 2006 Baishaxi Qianliangcha
item.description:
• Production year: 2006
  • Storage: Hunan
  • Month cut: 2024
  • Log weight: ~37 kg
  • Slice weight: ~650g / slice (+/- 10%)
  • Price: USD 100 / slice
  • Availability: In stock

Baishaxi (白沙溪) is arguably the most well-known producer of Qianliang tea (and Anhua heicha in general) today, so it likely needs no introduction. This …
item.dc:creator: Balthazar
